transcript.text: hi and welcome you listening to the x 22

cash now before I get started I just

uploaded to the x 22 report spotlight
channel you can go right over to youtube
type in x 22 report spotlight it will
bring you right to the video or you can
come over to the x 22 report com site
scroll down a little bit look over to
your right you'll see the interview
right there let's get right into the

are entering a period of time where the
US government central bankers are losing
control of what is happening around the

global debt around the world cannot be
sustained the debt in the United States
cannot be sustained we understand there
is no money out there that the people
can give so the central bankers will

lot more layoffs we're going to see the

estate in Auto Sales and as we go
through this holiday season more
retailers are going to close down more
corporations are going to announce
probably early winter early spring
around that time period of more people
are going to have to lay off and we're
starting to see it I mean just in this
past year we've seen hundreds of
thousands of people being laid off
twitter is laying off about 336 right
now fmc corp is laying off 850 and it's
not going to end anytime soon even
though the stock market continually
Rises then of course it falls the
revenues do not match what is going on
in this country the corporate revenues
are declining sales are declining and we
see here in the United States for the
first week of October
we're seeing that national chain stores
their sales have fallen by point two
percent in the first week of October it
already is beginning and we already know
they predicted that this holiday season
it's not going to be as good as in the
past but it won't be that bad this is
what they're trying to convince us of
but Black Friday Cyber Monday it's going
to be absolutely horrible think about
all the people that have been laid off
since the beginning of this year think
about all these people who cannot find
the same full-time job at the same
salary think about all these people who
are getting part-time work who don't
have the discretionary funds and we're
starting to see that the retail sales
they're not working out at this point
they're contracting and if people are
not going to be purchasing guess what
the factories aren't going to be
producing and we're seeing from the
economic indicators that this is
absolutely true manufacturing is down
the toilet the Baltic Dry Index is
dropping like a rock this is the raw
material that the factory is used to
produce the goods it's down to eight
hundred four down five points this is
the worst we've seen it at this time
period usually it's around 1500 usually
double what we're seeing right now now
of course the government is telling us
that everything is fine we're at five
point one percent unemployment except
for all those people that didn't want to
look for a job and we just did include
them and that turns out to be millions
90 what four million people now central
bankers they are pushing the idea that
we're going to need negative interest
rates they're pushing the idea that we
cannot allow these people to have cash
now they're pushing it in Greece at this
point just like we saw in Cyprus with
capital controls bank holiday and a
ballon we know in January Greece becomes
eligible for balance we see already they
introduced stricter capital controls
not letting people take cash out of the
banks and right now the Fed the central
bankers they're taking a much more
aggressive approach to ban cash the feds
plan to take hold of say savings during
the next round of crisis to stop
individuals from getting their money out
they don't want a repeat of what
happened in Greece when they knew the
country was headed in the wrong
direction which it's still headed in the
wrong direction people ran to the bank
took their money out so we are going to
see banks the Fed the government come
out and let us know that they need to
start limiting the cash withdrawals and
of course this is for your benefit
they'd rather you purchase everything
using your credit card or debit card and
to keep the bank's afloat and in good
standing to their new requirements they
cannot release a certain number of funds
to the public but don't worry everything
is fine you can make as many purchase as
you want using your debit card this is
the direction they are headed right now
the central banks they're bracing for a
rolling series of crisis they're getting
prepared for what is about to hit now of
course they're the cause of it they're
the ones that created all this the debt
right now cannot be sustained and hpc is
out there saying from our metrics we are

u.s. dollars and they're saying from
this chart we're already in a recession
a global recession and it's going to get
worse as time goes on they're saying
that global trade is also declining at
an alarming pace according to the latest

is negative eight point four percent to
find periods of equivalent declines we
only really find recessionary periods US
dollars is already negative to the tune
of 37 trillion or negative three point
four percent that is we are already in a
dollar recession so is anything going to
approve improve here no absolutely not
as time goes on it's going to get worse
and worse and there's no way out and the
only way out according to the central
bank's is to go after the people's money
and they've done this with Obamacare
would FATCA now if those people who
don't really understand what facut is
let me just explain what it is it's the
foreign account Tax Compliance Act and
there was a it's basically a law within
a law FATCA effectively commanded every

an information sharing agreement with
the IRS well actually it was one way
they wanted the information from the
banks to flow right to the IRS all

basically they're giving it all started
based on the phony assumption that

and we'll just take it from them and
this will solve our problems well guess
what happened all the countries had to

through the land of the free

they can't bring in enough guess what

it's enough to pay about 17 hours worth

they're going to want forty percent

it's impossible right now and they know

that's it now out in Tennessee there's a

Clay County Tennessee operates three
